# obstacles(fromNodeBounds:)

**Type Method**

Converts each node into an obstacle by transforming its bounds into the scene’s coordinate system.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func obstacles(fromNodeBounds nodes: [SKNode]) -> [GKPolygonObstacle]
```

## Parameters

- **nodes**: An array of [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKNode] objects.

## Return Value

An array of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/GameplayKit/GKPolygonObstacle] objects.

## Discussion

Use the array of obstacles to create an obstacle graph ([doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/GameplayKit/GKObstacleGraph]) in GameplayKit. See [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/GameplayKit] and [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/General/Conceptual/GameplayKit_Guide/index.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40015172].

## Adding GameplayKit Behaviors

- **entity**: The GameplayKit entity this node represents.
- **obstacles(fromNodePhysicsBodies:)**: Converts each node into an obstacle by transforming the node’s physics body shape into the scene’s coordinate system.
- **obstacles(fromSpriteTextures:accuracy:)**: Turns each node into an obstacle by changing the node’s texture into a physics shape and converting it into the scene’s coordinate system.
